column4: I run vanilla ubuntu on an ancient laptop with 1280MB of ram, works sufficiently well for my needs
does boot and resume a bit slowly, but once it's up it works for me.
but I guess I'm pretty patient :)
i'd have to have 4+ apps at the same time for work, which is itself a problem with 1gb of ram with these apps :(
yeah, I usually just run a browser, an editor, and one or more terms.
